item.title: 飞行是安全的，但在最坏的情况下，飞机上有没有最安全的坐位？一位安全专家说："如果你能告诉我飞机将如何坠毁，我就能告诉你该坐在哪里。
item.description:
Flying is safe, but in the worst-case scenario, is there a safest place to sit on a plane? “If you can tell me how an aircraft is going to crash, I can tell you where to sit,’’ one safety specialist says. https://t.co/gjmEpK83ho https://t.co/gjmEpK83ho

item.title: 中国修订了国家保密法，将以前不属于保密范围的敏感信息纳入其中，这可能会增加外国企业对在中国经营风险的担忧
item.description:
China revised its law on state secrets to encompass sensitive information that didn’t previously fall under its scope, potentially adding to foreign businesses’ concerns over the risks of operating in the country https://t.co/fs7iA9SQUv https://t.co/fs7iA9SQUv

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.description:
"The Way Home" star Andie MacDowell on the changes she made after her first big acting gig: "My strong Southern accent was holding me back, so I studied method acting and worked with dialect coach Sam Chwat." https://t.co/pOnj7P5BQT https://t.co/pOnj7P5BQT

item.title: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）表示，它将关闭 150 家门店，约占门店总数的 30%。"梅西百货首席执行官在接受采访时说："这不仅仅是收缩的问题。
item.description:
Macy's said it is closing 150 stores—around 30% of them. "This isn't just about shrinking," its CEO said in an interview. https://t.co/GmhJFd36QT https://t.co/GmhJFd36QT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：威廉-巴尔（William P. Barr）写道：苹果公司使用了一系列策略，这些策略的反竞争效果单独来看可能很微妙，但累积起来就会对竞争产生强大的抑制作用。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Apple uses an arsenal of tactics whose anticompetitive effects, taken individually, may operate subtly but, taken cumulatively, work powerfully to suppress competition, writes William P. Barr https://t.co/SkbsO6sfnN

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: 谷歌在人工智能领域的推进正成为一个令人头疼的声誉问题。围绕其聊天机器人的网络反弹表明了该公司为何迟迟不肯发布这项技术。

item.title: "河谷镇》（Riverdale）的主演查尔斯-梅尔顿（Charles Melton）曾因其青春梦幻的外表而非演技而闻名。现在，他开始涉足更严肃的角色，并赢得了高度赞扬。
item.description:
“Riverdale“ alum Charles Melton was once known more for his teen-dream looks rather than his acting skills. Now he’s stepping into more serious roles—and earning serious praise. https://t.co/cXz6thGUFF pic.twitter.com/fhdZRowmfh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024

item.title: Streetwise 专栏作家 @jmackin2 写道：私营部门投资者在监督公司方面效率低下，以至于国营基金认为有必要介入其中
item.description:

item.title: 创纪录的降雨让游客们抓住难得的机会，在地球上最干旱的地方--死亡谷，在一英尺深的水中划皮艇。独角兽浮漂就可以了。
item.description:
Record rains have tourists seizing the rare chance to kayak in water 1 foot deep at Death Valley, the earth’s driest place. A unicorn floatie will do. https://t.co/xDDClW1EFT https://t.co/xDDClW1EFT

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) February 27, 2024
